page.title: 15THE GHOST OF LADY WYNDHAM
page.content:
Last Century Lady Wyndham fainted at dinner.The people thought she was {dead}so she was{buried}in the Church. The{Verger}came in one night and went to Lady Wyndhams grave.He opened it up and got off her jewellery.He couldn't get her ring so he bagan to chop off her finger.She{woke up}so he ran away. {Lady Wyndham}picked up the lantern and walked to{Kentsford Farm. The dogs barked,the servants looked out of the door thinking she was a ghost and they screamed. They told Mr. Wyndham who went outside and saw his wife. Two weeks later she had a baby.She had nine sons and lived longer than her husband.
By Leanne Powers.
